title: The client keeps banning me because its not working properly.
body: The client keeps banning me because its not loading the game properly and terminates itself. I can't figure out the cause nor do I think its fair any suggestions to fix this problem?

replies.body:
I started having quite a few issues with my client as well about 4 days ago now, I'll drop the link to my thread.
 https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/s7eMlcVI-riottechs-knowledgeablecommunitymembers-major-client-glitches-and-freezing

Are you experiencing similar problems with your client? or just specifically issues with your client starting a game?

The most important thing to do right now is to take a break from joining a matchmaking game, and stick to customs to troubleshoot.  What exactly is happening?  Are there any error messages?  Is it just a black screen?  Toss me some more details, I'm happy to help!
